name: Lights On (Stroomkabel)
description:
We had 3 full days to come up with an idea for a game for the theme that was chosen by us. We chose for a light and dark theme.
The lights in the house need to be checked constantly or else......

Controls
WASD - Moves you around (duuh)
E - Interact with objects

Gameplay
You need to run around the house and enable all the lightswitches with 'E' key
But be warned: Don't stay too long in an area that is not lit, IT will catch you....
